author: zhaobenny
hollowstrawberry
description: Use a self-provided AUTOMATIC1111 endpoint to generate images through Discord
install_msg:
This cog will require your own AUTOMATIC1111-compatible endpoint to be configured.
See `[p]aimage` or `[p]aimageowner` for settings first. To generate, use `[p]imagine`
Slash is available and recommended, do `[p]slash enablecog aimage`, then `[p]slash sync`
short: A1111 Stable Diffusion image generation in Discord
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
